name: avr-bulk-flasher
description: For when you need to flash a lot of AVR devices with Arduino as ISP. Requires avrdude te be installed.

scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:windows && npm run build:macos && npm run build:linux
scripts.build:clean: rimraf build && rimraf zip && mkdir zip
scripts.build:windows: mkdir -p build/windows/prebuilds && pkg index.js -t node16-win-x64 -o build/windows/avr-bulk-flasher_v$(project-version)_win.exe && cp -r node_modules/@serialport/bindings-cpp/prebuilds/win32-x64 build/windows/prebuilds && zip -r zip/avr-bulk-flasher_v$(project-version)_win.zip build/windows/avr-bulk-flasher_v$(project-version)_win.exe build/windows/prebuilds
scripts.build:macos: mkdir -p build/macos/prebuilds && pkg index.js -t node16-macos-x64 -o build/macos/avr-bulk-flasher_v$(project-version)_macos && cp -r node_modules/@serialport/bindings-cpp/prebuilds/darwin-x64+arm64 build/macos/prebuilds && zip -r zip/avr-bulk-flasher_v$(project-version)_macos.zip build/macos/avr-bulk-flasher_v$(project-version)_macos build/macos/prebuilds
scripts.build:linux: mkdir -p build/linux/prebuilds && pkg index.js -t  node16-linux-x64 -o build/linux/avr-bulk-flasher_v$(project-version)_linux && cp -r node_modules/@serialport/bindings-cpp/prebuilds/linux-x64 build/linux/prebuilds && zip -r zip/avr-bulk-flasher_v$(project-version)_linux.zip build/linux/avr-bulk-flasher_v$(project-version)_linux build/linux/prebuilds

author: Sebastiaan Jansen - DrSkunk
